en.description: Critical Focus is a mod that increases the critical chance and damage of an Archwing gun when aiming by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

ko.description: Critical Focus is a mod that increases the critical chance and damage of an Archwing gun when aiming by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

ru.description: Critical Focus is a mod that increases the critical chance and damage of an Archwing gun when aiming by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.
